FuncDef: This command configures the number of missing hello PDUs from a neighbor SPB declares the adjacency down. This command is valid only for interfaces on control B-VPLS.

ParaDef.Info: The multiplier for the hello interval expressed as a decimal integer. Values-2 to 100.

ExtraInfo: Default: hello-interval 3 - SPB can miss up to 3 hello messages before declaring the adjacency down.
